short_summary: Canadian Transportation Agency seeks expertise of Information Management Specialist
full_summary:
---

### Request for Proposal: Senior Information Management Specialist

#### Reference
Tuesday, November 22, 2022, PW-22-01014028

#### Tender Title
* English: Senior Information Management Specialist, TSPS, National Capital Region (NCR)
* French: Spécialiste principal en gestion de l'information, SPTS, Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

#### Summary

The Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) invites proposals from qualified firms to provide information management services as a Senior Information Management Specialist. The selected contractor will support the updating and modernization of practices and procedures within the Information Management Division.

#### Qualifications and Experiences

* The contractor should have a degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or related field.
* A minimum of 10 years of experience in information management positions.
* Excellent knowledge of information management best practices and experience with modernization initiatives.
* Strong leadership and communication skills.

#### Contract Details

* The contract duration is from the award date to July 31, 2023.
* An option for extension is available for an additional one-year period.

#### Attachments

The Request for Proposal document and additional information can be found on the Canadabuys website: 

[English Attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/31602c2dd8fad385fac66e0aba6aa933/npp_-_tsps_-_2_11_information_records_management.pdf)
[France Attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/58f4d525b56e03443119a7ce65e6cf09/apm_-_spts_-_2_11_specialiste_en_gestion_de_l_information.pdf)

#### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact:
Nancy Trepanier
Canadian Transportation Agency
15 rue Eddy
Gatineau, QC J8X4B3, Canada
Phone: (09-012,end Number)
Email: nancy.trepanier@cta-otc.gc.ca
